definitions.title: n.f.pl.
definitions.body: sf. [[וּתְפוֹחוֹתֵיכֶם]] Je 25:34 (so van d. H) your dispersions (Vulgate al.); but Baer Gi [[תִיכֶם]]-, expl. as

definitions.title: vb. Tiph.
definitions.body: 1 s. Thes al., so (rdg. [[תְּפִיחוֹתִיכֶם]]) Hi Gf Kö:i.471; word corrupt; Gr [[וְנִפַּחְתִּיכֶם]], Gie [[וְנִפַּחְתֶּם]].
